statements: SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 AND awareness_level < 3;
SELECT location, gender, ethnicity FROM demographic_data WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT id, age, location, gender FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC, location DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, awareness_level FROM demographic_data WHERE ethnicity = 'Hispanic' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT id, age, gender, location FROM demographic_data WHERE campaign_id = 3 AND awareness_level >= 3;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 25;
SELECT age, gender, ethnicity FROM demographic_data WHERE awareness_level IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM public_health_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'Flu%';
SELECT campaign_name, target_population FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE ARRAY['children', 'elderly'] <@ target_population;
SELECT * FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, target_population FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC, income DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM demographic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM public_health_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, demographic_group, age_group, gender FROM public_health_campaigns JOIN demographic_data ON public_health_campaigns.campaign_id = demographic_data.data_id;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_score FROM public_health_campaigns JOIN campaign_impact ON public_health_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_impact.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Flu Vaccination Campaign';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT demographic_group, age_group, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age_group = '18-30' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT c.campaign_name, ci.impact_score FROM public_health_campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_impact ci ON c.campaign_id = ci.campaign_id WHERE ci.impact_score > 0.75;
SELECT d.demographic_group, p.end_date FROM demographic_data d LEFT JOIN public_health_campaigns p ON d.data_id = p.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data;
SELECT city, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT city, performance_score FROM campaign_performance WHERE performance_score > 0.8;
SELECT engagement_level, city FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT city, gender, age FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM public_health_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT city, performance_score FROM campaign_performance WHERE performance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT city, engagement_level FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY city
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT city, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT campaign_name, total_engagement, positive_feedback FROM campaign_results WHERE positive_feedback > 50;
SELECT campaign_id, cost FROM campaign_costs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT demographic_id, campaign_name, engagement_level FROM campaign_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 5 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(total_engagement) AS total_engagement_sum FROM campaign_results GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_engagement_sum > 10000 ORDER BY total_engagement_sum DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, cost FROM campaign_costs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, gender, ethnicity FROM campaign_demographics JOIN demographics ON campaign_demographics.demographic_id = demographics.id;
